title: Looking to have my ban removed!!!!!!!!
body:
Looking to have my ban removed, was unfair and unjust.

look into chat logs i did not feed, afk, be toxic nor break the "summoners code"

replies.body: If you want community feedback for a punishment, you'll have to post your chat logs. Noone can offer you opinions/advice if they have no context.
Good proof and argument. I'm sure they will be right on that unban for you ðŸ˜‚
